title: Cant play after clicking Launch
body:
I have a problem where I load up league, i click launch and then it doesn't do anything. The only solutions to fixing it are i have to repair my launcher EVERY single time i open up the client, then it allows me to play. I don't want to have to do that. I have looked it up and read many articles. Nothing seems to work. 
Things I have tried:
1. Restarting, obviously.
2. It's not my Razer i have turned it off and tried still doesn't work.
3. Repair launcher (works, but only for 1 time use.)
4. No firewall problems
5. I have went to my folder went through patches > rads > deleted all that shit on three different occasions and it still doesn't work.
So if anyone could find a solution for me that actually works that would be awesome.

replies.body: I deleted Lol_patcher and Lol_client, after doing so many things and it let me play but idk if its a one time use, will post again.
I'm glad to hear you resolved this for now. Hit me up with a reply if you see this happen again.
Yeah its happened multiple times since then, i just keep doing the same method to play.. frustrating.

Hmm.. you definitely shouldn't have to force a repatch before launching every time. Have you tried running League as admin? Simply right-click the shortcut and select *run as administrator*.

Let me know if that caused any sort of change.
Yeah, I have still not working. :(

We'll need to dive into some of your system logs to figure out what's going on. I recommend grabbing some system logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to your [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look.

Let me know if you run into issues.
